title: April in Rhodes near Cactus Hotel
description: I was in Rhodes for a week and this was my favorite place to stay. The hotel is in the middle of the city and has a beautiful view of the sea. The room was clean and the staff was friendly. The breakfast was good and the location was perfect. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone who is looking for a place to stay in Rhodes. I was there for the marathon
creator: 0xd05B20bA033843d6171C8707B4E08734cF9c6738
